text: Saale is the name of two rivers in Germany: Saale in Thuringia and Saxony- Anhalt (German: Sächsische Saale) and the Saale in Northern Bavaria (German: Fränkische Saale). The larger, and better known Sächsische Saale springs out of the Fichtelgebirge at 728 m and joins the Elbe in Saxony-Anhalt. It is 413 km long. Category:Rivers of Bavaria Category:Rivers of Saxony-Anhalt Category:Rivers of Thuringia
title: Saale
